sn22.128:4.1: At one time Venerable Sāriputta and Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita were staying near Benares, in the deer park at Isipatana. …
sn22.128:4.3: “Reverend Sāriputta, they speak of this thing called ‘knowledge’.
sn22.128:4.5: And how is an knowledgeable person defined?”
sn22.128:5.1: “Reverend, it’s when an educated noble disciple truly understands form, which is liable to originate …
sn22.128:5.3: liable to originate and vanish, as form which is liable to originate and vanish.
sn22.128:5.10: consciousness, which is liable to originate … liable to vanish … liable to originate and vanish, as consciousness which is liable to originate and vanish.
sn22.128:5.14: And this is how an knowledgeable person is defined.”
